info.author: Justin Willis
info.description:
An artificial intelligence written in Python

Install
-------

::

	pip install myAI

Requires
--------

- [SoX]
- [Festival]

Usage
-----

::

	from myAI import AI

	jarvis = AI.BasicBot('Jarvis')

	while True:
		jarvis.talk()

Install

pip install myAI

Requires

Usage
